scenario_text.value: They came through here, huh...
(It’s getting colder and colder...)
Aoi’s shaking...
The tunnel is cold!
Is this still being used?
You’re shaking, Aoi.
Are you okay, Aoi? You don’t look too good.
Um, yes... I’m fine.

It must be the snow. I feel like it’s worse
in here than out there...
Jeez, it’s cold in here.

Jeez, it’s cold in here. Do you have any
mittens or anything, Minoru?

Why the heck would I have mittens in spring?!
Didn’t see a cold snap like this coming.

Yeah, that’s true. I bet those three that
went ahead are really feeling it now.
Is this still being used?

This tunnel looks...pretty worn down from
the outside. Is it still being used?

Not since I came here, at any rate. Even the
local brats won’t come near here.

People haven’t set foot in there for ages.
There might even be actual beasts...like boars.
Those guys went into a place like that...

I imagine they just ran on in if Miu was with
them. She’s used to the place.

It’s getting dark, and the footing isn’t
great here. Let’s go, but watch your step.

It’s pitch black... I can hardly see in front
of me.

Heh heh, still, isn’t this like some kinda
expedition? I’m getting kinda pumped!
Hey! This is NO time to play around!

It’s not safe for us to keep going like this.
Ah, but if we use the camera light...
GYEEEEEEP!
Eek! Ohhhh knock it off, Minoru!

Don’t just scream like that! Even I got
spooked.
Uh, my bad. I just saw this here, so...
This is...a sacred rope?
What would something like that be doing here?

Hmm. Maybe this is where the Kemonogami are
enshrined or something?

Now that I think about it, you mentioned that you
weren’t allowed to enter here, right?

Yeah... The village believes in retribution.
Kids are warned to stay out.

Ahhh! Wh- what is this wind coming from the
tunnel entrance...?

Oh jeez, there must be a hell of a storm
whipping up outside.

You think those three are in trouble? We’d
better hurry on to the shrine!

Yes, uh, yes you’re right. Come on, there’s
no time to lose!
